room_title: Escape room "Dead Man's Secret" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
room_description: One day, you receive a mysterious letter from your reclusive, but fabulously wealthy Uncle. He tells you that he knows his time has come, and he has chosen you to be his heir, but your relatives are hot on your tail... Thanks to his letter, you are first to arrive at his mansion. Now you must begin your search to find the secret to his unimaginable wealth!
